ðŸ“– Summary: Parlant is a Python framework for building LLM agents designed for control and real-world use. It ensures agents follow instructions by using a principle-based approach rather than relying on system prompts. Parlant allows developers to define agent behavior with natural language and deploy agents quickly, offering guaranteed compliance and easy integration.
